Import Images¶

Import images from a directory(s)

Signals¶

Inputs:

  • (None)

Outputs:

  • Data

    Dataset describing one image in each row.

Description¶

Import Images walks through a directory and returs one row per located image. Columns include image name, path to image, width, height and image size.
